Package at.irian.ankor.switching.connector

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionHandler<P extends ModelAddress>
    Connector-specific handler for opening an closing connections between model instances.
    Connector
    A Connector connects an internal or external model instance to the Switchboard.
    ConnectorLoader
    The ConnectorLoader is responsible for locating and loading pluggable connectors.
    ConnectorMapping
    The ConnectorMapping is the abstraction for getting the right handler for a specific ModelAddress type.
    ConnectorRegistry
    The ConnectorRegistry is the authority at which connectors register their respective handlers.
    HandlerScopeContext
    Context for storing custom attributes in the handler scope.
    TransmissionHandler<P extends ModelAddress>
    Connector-specific handler for transmitting event messages from one model instance to another.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultConnectorLoader
    Default implementation of the ConnectorLoader which uses the Java standard ServiceLoader pattern to locate and load pluggable connectors.
    DefaultConnectorRegistry
    Default implementation of the ConnectorRegistry that uses ConcurrentHashMaps for storage of the registered handlers.
    SimpleHandlerScopeContext
    Simple HashMap-based HandlerScopeContext.
    ThreadLocalHandlerScopeContext
    HandlerScopeContext that uses a ThreadLocal for storing worker-local values.
